actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should not furnish less assistance to Israel in fiscal year 1977 than it provided in fiscal year 1976.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that United States assistance for Israel for fiscal year 1977 should not be less than United States assistance for Israel for fiscal year 1976.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should not furnish less assistance to Israel in fiscal year 1977 than it provided in fiscal year 1976.
